text: thumb Nicor Gas is an energy company headquartered in Naperville, Illinois. Its largest subsidiary, Nicor Gas, is a natural gas distribution company. Founded in 1954, the company serves more than two million customers in a service territory that encompasses most of the northern third of Illinois, excluding the city of Chicago. Nicor Gas has of pipelines. AGL Resources announced its acquisition of Nicor in December 2010; the acquisition closed the following year. Southern Company announced its acquisition of AGL in 2016. ==See also== * Fixed bill ==References== ==External links and sources== *Nicor Gas website * Category:Natural gas companies of the United States Category:Natural gas pipeline companies Category:Energy infrastructure in Illinois Category:Companies based in Naperville, Illinois Category:American companies established in 1954 Category:Energy companies established in 1954 Category:Non-renewable resource companies established in 1954 Category:1954 establishments in Illinois Category:2011 mergers and acquisitions Category:Natural gas pipelines in Illinois
title: Nicor Gas
